tags.
formulas.name: ReplaceLineFeedsInRatingNotes

Flow.label: Email Summarizing PRB Outcome to Inventors

textTemplates.name: Conditional_Proceed_Without_Mentors
textTemplates.text:
Confidential: Attorney-Client Privileged Communication

Hi {!Trimnames},

Thank you for presenting your invention to the {!CleanPRBMeetingName} PRB on {!PRBMeeting.SymphonyIPM__Meeting_Date__c}.

Below is a summary of the PRB evaluation:
{!IDFHyperlink}: {!Singledisclosure.SymphonyIPM__Title__c}
Inventor(s): {!Singledisclosure.Inventors__c}
Decision: {!Singledisclosure.Final_Rating__c}
{!ReplaceLineFeedsInRatingNotes}

Next Steps:

  • Please contact invention@uhg.com to request mentors or you can find mentors on our site and add them to your IDF. Then connect with any assigned mentors directly as needed.
  • After the IDF and any associated files in ISM have been updated, please select the Next button in the Respond to Request for Information card. If you have problems updating the IDF and any associated files please contact patents@uhg.com and invention@uhg.com.
  • Please highlight any updates in a different color so that reviewers can easily identify the updates.

NEW Please provide feedback on your Patent Review Board (PRB) experience here: {!SurveyHyperlink}.

Please feel free to reach out with any questions.

Best regards,
{!UserFirstName}
_______________________________________________
{!UserFirstName} {!UserLastName} | {!$User.Title}
UHG IP Legal / Patent Business Operations Team
9900 Bren Road East, MN008-T615, Minnetonka, MN 55343
{!UserTelephone}{!$User.Email}

textTemplates.name: Defer_Without_Mentors
textTemplates.text:
Confidential: Attorney-Client Privileged Communication

Hi {!Trimnames},

Thank you for presenting your invention to the {!CleanPRBMeetingName} PRB on {!PRBMeeting.SymphonyIPM__Meeting_Date__c}.

Below is a summary of the PRB evaluation:
{!IDFHyperlink}: {!Singledisclosure.SymphonyIPM__Title__c}
Inventor(s): {!Singledisclosure.Inventors__c}
Decision: {!Singledisclosure.Final_Rating__c}
{!ReplaceLineFeedsInRatingNotes}

Next Steps:

  • The PRB would like to provide this team with another opportunity to present this invention in order to address the issues listed above.
  • Please contact invention@uhg.com to request mentors or you can find mentors on our site and add them to your IDF. Then connect with any assigned mentors directly as needed.
  • After the IDF and any associated files in ISM have been updated, please select the Next button in the Respond to Request for Information card. If you have problems updating the IDF and any associated files please contact patents@uhg.com.
    • Please highlight any updates in a different color so that reviewers can easily identify the updates.
  • Once resubmitted, the IDF will be scheduled for an additional review by the PRB.

NEW Please provide feedback on your Patent Review Board (PRB) experience here: {!SurveyHyperlink}.

Please feel free to reach out with any questions.

Best regards,
{!UserFirstName}
_______________________________________________
{!UserFirstName} {!UserLastName} | {!$User.Title}
UHG IP Legal / Patent Business Operations Team
9900 Bren Road East, MN008-T615, Minnetonka, MN 55343
{!UserTelephone}{!$User.Email}

textTemplates.name: TemplateforPRBReviewComplete_Close
textTemplates.text:
Confidential: Attorney-Client Privileged Communication

Hi {!Trimnames},

Thank you for presenting your invention to the {!CleanPRBMeetingName} PRB on {!PRBMeeting.SymphonyIPM__Meeting_Date__c}.

Below is a summary of the PRB evaluation:
{!IDFHyperlink}: {!Singledisclosure.SymphonyIPM__Title__c}
Inventor(s): {!Singledisclosure.Inventors__c}
Decision: {!Singledisclosure.Final_Rating__c}

The PRB has decided not to pursue patent protection for this invention. As a reminder, you also have the option to provide a GL to fund the prior art search and patent application using business segment funding rather than getting approval from the PRB for central budget funding. The fees for the patent application process are approximately:

  • $2500 - patentability search,
  • $12000 to $15000 - if the search is favorable, application preparation and filing depending on the complexity of the invention, and
  • $2000 - provisional application preparation and filing if we need to quickly file something due to a bar date, such as a public disclosure or commercial use.
You also have the option to get approval from a business leader who supports filing a patent application on your invention despite receiving a close rating from the PRB.

We look forward to receiving additional IDFs from you in the future.

NEW Please provide feedback on your Patent Review Board (PRB) experience here: {!SurveyHyperlink}.

Please feel free to reach out with any questions.

Best regards,
{!UserFirstName}
_______________________________________________
{!UserFirstName} {!UserLastName} | {!$User.Title}
UHG IP Legal / Patent Business Operations Team
9900 Bren Road East, MN008-T615, Minnetonka, MN 55343
{!UserTelephone}{!$User.Email}

9900 Bren Road East, MN008-T615, Minnetonka, MN 55343

textTemplates.name: TemplateforPRBReviewComplete_Proceed
textTemplates.text:
Confidential: Attorney-Client Privileged Communication

Hi {!Trimnames},

Thank you for presenting your invention to the {!CleanPRBMeetingName} PRB on {!PRBMeeting.SymphonyIPM__Meeting_Date__c}.

Below is a summary of the PRB evaluation:
{!IDFHyperlink}: {!Singledisclosure.SymphonyIPM__Title__c}
Inventor(s): {!Singledisclosure.Inventors__c}
Decision: {!Singledisclosure.Final_Rating__c}

Congratulations! The PRB has decided to pursue patent protection for this invention. IP Legal will reach to you regarding next steps.

textTemplates.name: TemplateforPRBReviewComplete_Publish
textTemplates.text:
Confidential: Attorney-Client Privileged Communication

Hi {!Trimnames},

Thank you for presenting your invention to the {!CleanPRBMeetingName} PRB on {!PRBMeeting.SymphonyIPM__Meeting_Date__c}.

Below is a summary of the PRB evaluation:
{!IDFHyperlink}: {!Singledisclosure.SymphonyIPM__Title__c}
Inventor(s): {!Singledisclosure.Inventors__c}
Decision: {!Singledisclosure.Final_Rating__c}

The PRB has decided to pursue defensive publication for this invention rather than patent protection. IP Legal will reach to you regarding next steps.

NEW Please provide feedback on your Patent Review Board (PRB) experience here: {!SurveyHyperlink}.

Please feel free to reach out with any questions.

Best regards,
{!UserFirstName}
_______________________________________________
{!UserFirstName} {!UserLastName} | {!$User.Title}

9900 Bren Road East, MN008-T615, Minnetonka, MN 55343
